purpose: To provide a standard library for developing AI agents that can work with any large language model (LLM) using TypeScript.
principle: Built on TypeScript, it leverages modular components to integrate with various LLMs, enabling developers to create and manage AI agents efficiently.
reusability: Highly composable with TypeScript SDKs, supports integration with different LLMs, and offers a modular architecture for building custom AI agents.
limitations: As it is in alpha status, it may lack comprehensive documentation and stability, and there could be limited support for non-TypeScript environments.
name: agentic
description: AI agent stdlib that works with any LLM and TypeScript AI SDK.
highlight: Flexible AI agent standard library compatible with any LLM and TypeScript AI SDK.
